panels.description: Total number of CPUs cores on node
panels.title: CPU Cores

panels.description: Total amount of memory on node
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Disclaimer: query contains a set of typical hardware interfaces seen on Linux systems. Some unrecognized interfaces may not be included in the query.
panels.title: Physical Interfaces Ingress Errors

panels.description: Disclaimer: query contains a set of typical hardware interfaces seen on Linux systems. Some unrecognized interfaces may not be included in the query.
panels.title: Physical Interfaces Egress Errors

panels.description: Shows whether any metrics at all were received for this Node during the time period.

Aproxement total disk space available on to the root device on this node.

Disclaimer: this query excludes the temporary filesystems (tmpfs,devtmpfs,overlay). Thus, if swap storage is used, these file systems may use disk space, causing this result to appear smaller than it should.
panels.title: Disk Size

panels.description:
On Linux, load average represents the average number of running and uninterruptable processes residing in the kernel's execution queue. 

Typically, short term, midterm, and longterm series give running averages of 1m, 5m, and 15m, respectively.
panels.title: Load Average

panels.description: Average non-idle CPU activity of all cores on node
panels.title: Aggregate CPU Usage

panels.description: Shows average time spent for each activity across all cores
panels.title: Aggr. CPU Usage by Type

panels.description: Disclaimer: query contains a set of typical hardware interfaces seen on Linux systems. Some unrecognized interfaces may not be included in the query.

panels.description:
Approximate percentage of total disk bandwidth being used.

Weighted I/O includes the backlog that may be accumulating.
panels.title: Disk Load

panels.description: Average time each I/O operation took to complete. Per the collectd disk plugin docs (https://collectd.org/wiki/index.php/Plugin:Disk), this average is not very accurate.
panels.title: Average I/O Operation Time
